page.title: 06EDUCATION (Continued)
page.content: {School Work Most of our work is Maths,English and environmental studies .In Maths ,we add,subtract,multiply and divide.We work from books such as Alpha,Beta,Flecher and 5,6,and 7a day. You get a tick if you're right and a cross if you're wrong.We write in joined-up writing.We also write stories and do comprehension.Our readers are Ginn readers and Puffin. Every year the fourth and fifth years have a swimming gala.We swim every week. We also draw and play games such as football,netball and rounders.There is a sports day when we run races. We have school visits to places like museums,the coast and Carlisle Airport. After school,once a week,we do activities like gym,pottery etc.
